question: How familiar are you with different career options in your field of study?
options: Very familiar – I’ve explored many options
Somewhat familiar – I know a few paths
Not very familiar – I know only the basics
Not at all – I need guidance

question: Have you ever spoken to a working professional or mentor about career choices?
options: Yes, multiple times
Yes, once or twice
No, but I would like to
No, and I don’t know how to find one

question: How often do you read or watch content about career development (like videos, blogs, news, etc.)?
options: Regularly (weekly or more)
Sometimes (monthly)
Rarely
Never

question: Which of the following activities have you participated in?
options: Internships or part-time jobs
Workshops, hackathons, or competitions
Career counselling sessions
Online certification courses
None of the above

question: How comfortable are you using the internet to explore career opportunities (LinkedIn, job portals, etc.)?
options: Very comfortable – I actively use them
Somewhat comfortable – I’ve used them occasionally
Not very comfortable – I’ve tried but find it confusing
I’ve never tried using these platforms

question: Do you know how to build a resume or prepare for interviews?
options: Yes – I have experience and confidence
Somewhat – I’ve tried but need practice
No – I have no idea where to start
I’ve heard about it but never made one
